attributes.action: Please allow members of the British National Party and supporters of the party to be allowed to exercise their right to vote without being attacked and threatened.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please allow members of the British National Party and supporters of the party to be allowed to exercise their right to vote without being attacked and threatened by the likes of Unite Against Fascism and others who seem to want to hurt anyone that does not agree with their own doctrine, I’d like the government to bring in a law of protection for all voters from intimidation……..Help keep democracy alive and free.
